text: Dangshi, wo dui tianshimen shuo:“Nimen dang fucong a dan.” Tamen dou fucongle, wei yi bu lisi liwai. Ta [yi bu lisi] yuan shi jingling, ta weibeile ta de zhu de mingling. Ta he ta de houyi dou shi nimen de diren, nandao nimen yao she wo er yi tamen wei baohu zhe ma? Bu yi zhe suo huanqu de zhen elie!
